parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: false, error: 'Tenant not active or credentials not found' }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT status FROM weekly_snapshots
     WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid
       AND week_id   = '{{ $json.week_id }}'
     LIMIT 1),
    'not_found'
  ) AS status,
  '{{ $json.week_id }}'   AS week_id,
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}' AS tenant_id,
  {{ $json.week_offset }} AS week_offset;

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, message: 'Historical backfill complete', tenant_id: $('Extract Tenant ID').first().json.tenant_id, weeks_processed: $('Extract Tenant ID').first().json.max_weeks }) }}
